# tdp-ckan-connector



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                  | Type      | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `debug`  | `debug`   | Render basic component connection state info | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `site`   | `site`    | The url to the CKAN site                     | `string`  | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event   | Description                                                | Type               |
| ------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `ready` | Dispatched when a connection to a CKAN site is established | `CustomEvent<any>` |
